item.title: Gli uomini dal passo pesante
item.description: The Tramplers is a 1965 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Albert Band and Mario Sequi based on the novel Guns of North Texas by Will Cook.

item.title: Seven Dollars on the Red
item.description: Sette dollari sul rosso is a 1966 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Alberto Cardone. It stars Anthony Steffen as the main character.

item.title: Bullet in the Flesh
item.description: Bullet in the Flesh or Il piombo e la carne is a 1964 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Marino Girolami.

item.title: One Thousand Dollars on the Black
item.description: Blood at Sundown is a Spaghetti Western film directed by Alberto Cardone. The picture marks the first appearance of the character Sartana, played by Gianni Garko. It is not, however considered an "official" Sartana film.
